description:
Enter the new McDonald's App and get exclusive discounts and coupons!  

Download our app and easily access special experiences, promotions and discounts so you can enjoy your favorite McDonald's products for much less than what you usually pay.  

You will receive alerts at the moment to find out in scoop of our new coupons and offers available to you.

  In addition, to help you choose your favorite product, we show you all the products with their nutritional information of your favorite hamburger or sandwich, desserts, beverages, salads and cravings.

  Do you want a Big Mac, a McNuggets or a Chocolate Sundae and you do not know where to find your nearest McDonald's restaurant? Through the app you can go to the section "restaurants" and you can see the establishment at a less distance from you and check our schedules and services.

Our app is available in Argentina, Aruba, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Curacao, Ecuador, Guadeloupe, French Guiana, Martinique, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Puerto Rico, Trinidad and Tobago, Uruguay and Venezuela *.

Access your account and place an order for delivery through McDelivery, in Colombia and Brazil.  

What are you waiting for? Download it now and enjoy the advantages offered by the McDonald's app! Happiness in the form of an app has arrived!

The app uses geolocation to show promotions near the user's location.

* Venezuela does not include offers or discounts, only combos, restaurant locator and nutritional information.

More than ever, ask for whatever!

With PedidosYa on your phone, you'll be able to fly into a world of wonder! The best part? We deliver your deepest cravings wherever you want in just minutes!

You can order online straight from the best restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies and many more! Anything you want in just three steps: Choose from the menu, order what you want and we deliver it to you!

You want it? You got it!
- Explore all the new hot places around your area
- Reorder your last items easily
- Enjoy all the deals and exclusive promos
- Read and write comments about our partners

We're flying to you!
- Customize your order
- Choose all your favorite items
- Schedule the time of your order
- Select the payment method that suits you

We deliver your order wherever you want
- Keep you posted with your order status
- Track your order LIVE
- Need assistance? Our help center is here for you!

Are you in Argentina, Bolivia, Chile, Dominican Republic, Paraguay or Uruguay? We love to make your life easier by delivering your orders in minutes!

Buen Provecho es una solución al problema del desperdicio de alimentos. Conectamos a tiendas con excedente de comida con personas interesadas en comprarla a un precio de descuento y evitar su desperdicio. Somos una comunidad de triple impacto positivo: económico, social y ambiental. Súmate!

TRY RAPPI TODAY

Get everything delivered in minutes. Discover the app that makes life simpler.

Rappi brings you the best selection of food, groceries, liquor, convenience items, pharmacy essentials, flowers, and so much more. With over 200,000 restaurants and stores in 300+ cities across Latin America, Rappi connects you with the best products in your city.

WHAT CAN YOU ORDER?

- Your favorite meals: Pizzas, burgers, bowls, sushi, and much more.
- Rappi Turbo for ultra-fast, 10-min deliveries: Over 8,000 everyday products and meals brought to your door in minutes.
- Groceries: Fresh items from top brands, handpicked by experts and delivered to your door.
- Pharmacy: Everything you need to take care of yourself, anytime.
- Liquor and convenience: Drinks, snacks, and more for your next gathering with friends or family.
- Pet care and gifts: Treat your furry friends or find the perfect gift from thousands of options.
- RappiFavor: Need a concierge? We'll pick up, buy or deliver anything for you. Quick and reliable task-based deliveries are here to help.
- Rappi Bank & Rappi Card: Credit card with no annual fees, cashback perks, and 24/7 support.
- Rappi Travel: Plan your next trip with exclusive deals on flights and hotels.

WHAT'S NEW WITH RAPPI

- Follow your friends: See their favorites, share recommendations, and connect over what you enjoy.
- Top recommendations: Discover local foodie picks from influencers, celebrities, and foodies across 9 countries.
- Exclusive offers just for you: Enjoy personalized discounts and offers, all in one place and tailored to your interests. 
- Rappi Turbo has more: More products, more categories, and now lower prices. Plus, you can now get your entire grocery list delivered in minutes.
- More precise searches: Find exactly what you’re looking for with AI-powered search.
- 24/7 10-min delivery stores: More Turbo stores are open around the clock. Order what you need, whenever you need it.
- And so much more: Update the app to explore all the latest features!

HOW IT WORKS

Browse everything the app has to offer, choose what you need, and get it delivered to your door in minutes with real-time tracking. Want it later? Schedule your delivery for the perfect time.

WHERE WE DELIVER

Rappi is available in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Mexico, Peru, and Uruguay—connecting you with the best your city has to offer.

DOWNLOAD RAPPI AND REDEFINE HOW YOU EXPERIENCE YOUR CITY.

Aplicación oficial de Burger King® Uruguay para acceder a descuentos y beneficios exclusivos para usuarios registrados.
Descubrí la mejor forma de comer tus hamburguesas a la parrilla preferidas a precios únicos. Elegí tu opción ideal, acercate a cualquiera de nuestros locales y probá nuestra famosa Whopper® o la clásica Mega Stacker® y acompañalas con crujientes papas fritas o con los deliciosos aros de cebolla.
Disfrutá tu comida favorita de Burger King® como vos querés.

¡Nueva APP, + descuentos, + beneficios!

Nuestra última actualización va a hacer que tu experiencia sea MAYÚSCULA.

Tenemos descuentos exclusivos para vos para cada momento del día: desayuno, almuerzo, merienda y cena. Ahora podés elegir y descargar tu promo favorita super rápido y canjearla en el local más cercano o usarla a través de nuestro e-commerce.

Comprá ¡SIN HACER FILA! Súper fácil: armas tu carrito, pagas, retiras tu orden y la disfrutas como más te guste, en el local o para llevar.

¿No tenés ganas de salir? ¡Nosotros te lo llevamos! Pedí a través de nuestro delivery para que vos y tus amigos disfruten donde sea.

No te olvides de activar las notificaciones para enterarte todas las novedades.

Descargá la APP y empezá a disfrutar todo lo que tenemos para vos. Ya disponible en Argentina, Uruguay y ¡ahora también en Paraguay!

Seguinos en nuestras redes sociales para enterarte de más promociones y novedades.

Hay un Grido en cada localidad y también en tu celular, para que los momentos felices lleguen a tu casa ¡o vayas al local con todo resuelto! En esta app vas a encontrar:
Todos nuestros productos con sus precios e información nutricional.
Locales cercanos con su ubicación, servicios y horarios disponibles para visitar y disfrutar tus productos favoritos.
Tienda online para pedir por delivery o comprar y retirar por el local más cercano. Podés ver tu carrito de compras y tus pedidos para hacer seguimiento en detalle.
En Argentina, si te asociaste al Club, podés ver tus puntos acumulados, conocer cuántos puntos necesitas para canjear un producto y contar con tu tarjeta virtual para canjear sin necesidad de llevar el plástico al local.
Si no sos socio aún, podés registrarte y gestionar los datos de tu cuenta.
Notificaciones de los lanzamientos y promociones especiales para que no te pierdas ninguna novedad.
Podés actualizar el contenido de la app en cualquier país al que viajes donde tenemos locales y seguir disfrutando nuestros productos.
Todo esto con una experiencia simple, diseñada para que encuentres lo que necesitas en pocos clics. Descargala y disfrutá tu tiempo compartiendo con tu familia y amigos más momentos felices.

Pedí tu Pizza de Domino’s desde tu teléfono. De forma directa y sencilla pedí tu Pizza hecha en el momento.

Hacé tu pedido online para recibirlo en tu casa o retirar en el local, elegí tus favoritos o arma tu propia Pizza adaptada a tus gustos.

Podés pedir las clásicas y las especiales, disfrutar de nuestros frescos ingredientes probando cualquiera de nuestras ricas Pizzas: Uruguaya Muzza, Pepperoni, Fugazetta, Napolitana, Italiana, Vegetariana, Hawaiana, Hawaiana Chicken, Pecado Carnal y Americana. Pedila con Borde de Queso y agrega Garlic y Cheesy Bread. Para disfrutar con amigos, con la familia o disfrutar sólo en casa. Del horno a tus manos en un par de clicks.

La App de Domino’s Pizza te permite pedir Online de la mejor manera. Hacer tu pedido es muy simple, podés visualizar rápidamente las promociones para hacer tu compra de manera inteligente. Disfrutá de nuestros atractivos cupones y ofertas. La App se adapta a tus gustos y preferencias para que disfrutes tu Pizza hecha en el momento.

Características:

Pedí tu Domino’s Pizza desde tu teléfono de manera simple y divertida.

Lo que nos hace únicos:

* Experiencia de usuario con mejora basada en tus preferencias y gustos, con la tecnología de Quick Swipe.
* Encontrá tu Domino’s más cercano en la App.
* Compra rápida y directa desde nuestros Menus Simples.
* Pedido Personalizado.
* Seguí tu pedido en tiempo real.

Uso e instalación de la App de Domino’s Pizza para pedido Online:

Se requiere acceso al sistema para un mejor funcionamiento. Se solicitan también datos de contacto y ubicación para una mejor experiencia. Por favor permitir esos permisos para poder aprovechar de la mejor manera la App.

Cómo hacer tu pedido:

La App de Domino’s Pizza, te permite pedir online en pocos pasos.

Al inicio podés elegir nuestras ofertas o navegar hacia tu Pizza favorita, disfrutando las diferentes opciones según lo que más te tiente.

Después de elegir tu Pizza, la podés agregar a tu carrito y personalizarla con tus toppings favoritos. También podés agregar tu bebida favorita y completar el pedido con un postre si te tienta.

El último paso es donde decís el método de pago para finalizar tu compra.

Aceptamos pagos en efectivo, tarjeta de débito y de crédito.

developer: Refrescos y Aguas Minerales, S. de R.L. de C.V.
description:
Juntos+ en cualquier momento y cualquier lugar
Juntos+ le ayudará a ampliar su negocio y a vender más y mejor.
Compre rápidamente, con varias ventajas exclusivas.
 
● Encuentra toda tu cartera de Coca-Cola y una amplia variedad de otros productos/categorías.
● Realiza pedidos desde tu móvil a cualquier hora del día, cualquier día de la semana.
● Recibe promociones exclusivas.
● Gana puntos con las compras y retos para canjearlos por tus productos favoritos.
 
Juntos+ entiende tus necesidades y quiere verte crecer.
Descárgate la app y lleva tu negocio a nuevas fronteras.

Transform your everyday ingredients and cook delicious meals with Cookpad! Designed for home cooks of all skill levels, Cookpad offers step by step easy-to-follow, flavorful recipes. Explore a vast collection of recipes, save your favorites, and use Cookpad as your personal recipe organizer with themed folders. Share your own creations and discover new dishes from a vibrant food-loving community. Download Cookpad today and start cooking!

MAIN FATURES:

Endless inspiration, thousands of recipes for your everyday meals: 
- From tasty & healthy breakfasts to quick lunches and mouth-watering dinners, explore thousands of home-cooked recipes. And don’t forget the desserts—baked, frozen, or made in an air fryer!
- Global flavors: Discover dishes from Spanish, Italian, Thai, Japanese, and other cuisines 
- Ingredient-based search: Cook great meals with what you already have in your fridge or pantry. Save money, reduce food waste, and make cooking more enjoyable.
- Catering to all diets: Use filters to find recipes for specific preferences like vegan, vegetarian, keto, gluten-free, and more
- Healthy and diverse cooking methods: From roasting and grilling to using an air fryer, Instant Pot, or slow cooker, find a variety of methods in one powerful app 

Keep all your recipes organized in one sole place:
- Build your personal collection of recipes and keep all your cooking adventures organized
- Create private folders by category (such as fish or meat recipes, desserts, etc.) and plan your weekly menus effortlessly

Share your cooking creations:
- Share your favorite recipes with friends, family, or the Cookpad community
- Or keep your creations private, just for you

Join a vibrant community:
- Connect with passionate home cooks, follow other food creators, and get help in the kitchen when you need it
- Upload photos (cooksnaps) of the dishes you’ve cooked and share your cooking experience with others.
- Cookpad is designed for everyone—from beginners to experienced cooks—and for any occasion, from daily meals to special gatherings. 

Cookpad app is ads-free
- Enjoy a seamless free from interruption cooking experience with Cookpad app!

Cookpad is free to download and use. For those looking to enhance their experience, we offer an optional subscription service with the following features:
- Get the most popular recipes at the top of search results with Premium Search.
- Save unlimited recipes from other home cooks, so you always have inspiration at hand.
- Use advanced search filters to match your cooking preferences.

Cookpad Premium is available in Arabic speaking countries, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, France, Greece, Hungary, India (English only), Indonesia, Italy, Malaysia, Mexico, Romania, Poland, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay and Vietnam.

Terms & Conditions: 
- Your monthly payment will be charged to your Apple ID account 
- Your subscription is automatically renewed month by month, unless you cancel it with a minimum of 24 hours before the end of the current period 
- Your account will be renewed in the 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Unless stated otherwise at the point of subscription, the monthly renewal cost is the same as the initial cost. 
- Subscriptions are managed by you and auto-renewal of the Premium Service can be canceled by going to your Apple ID account settings after purchase. 
- Read the full Terms & Conditions here. https://cookpad.com/en/terms 
- Read the privacy policy here: https://cookpad.com/en/privacy Get in touch with us: help@cookpad.com

Contact us with any feedback or suggestions: help@cookpad.com

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.
Aplicación oficial de pedidos online.

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.

developer: iFood Agencia de servicos de restaurantes LTDA
description:
Compre em mercados, restaurantes, farmácias e pet shop de forma fácil e rápida, tudo a um toque de você. As ofertas dos melhores mercados e restaurantes da sua cidade estão no IFood. Aqui você também encontra produtos para seu pet além de comprar itens de farmácia.

Pensou em pedir comida? Peça no IFood! Ir ao mercado, farmácia ou pet shop? Esquece, vai de IFood!

Delivery de Restaurantes
Não importa se você quer comer sushi, comida vegetariana, hambúrguer, pizza ou experimentar um restaurante novo. Use o iFood e peça em vários restaurantes no melhor app de delivery de comida para sua fome e seu bolso, sem precisar esperar uma Black Friday

Delivery de Mercado
Bateu aquela vontade de preparar sua comida em casa ou faltou algum item da compra do mês? Você pode aproveitar nosso delivery de mercado para comprar os ingredientes que faltam e receber na sua casa!

Delivery de Bebidas
Que tal umas bebidas pra curtir com os amigos no fim de semana? Com o iFood você recebe as bebidas em casa e ainda economiza com cupons de desconto e ofertas.

Delivery de Farmácia
Precisa comprar remédios, fraldas, produtos de higiene, produtos de beleza ou algum outro item de farmácia? É só pedir pelo iFood! Compre remédios, produtos de beleza e outros itens de farmácia com cupons de oferta e descontos disponíveis nas farmácias mais perto de você.

Delivery de Pet Shop
Acabou a ração do seu pet? Precisa de areia pra sua gatinha? Não tem problema! Com o iFood você pode pedir ração, areia de gato, remédios veterinários e outros itens de pet com cupons de desconto e ofertas nos pet shops perto da sua casa.

Cupons e descontos pra vc
Com o iFood você sempre tem opção de mercado, restaurante, farmácia e pet shop pra comprar com qualidade gastando pouco sempre, não só na Black Friday. Confira os vários cupons disponíveis pra você e aproveite os descontos em restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia e pet shop com entrega grátis pra pedir a qualquer hora do dia.

Milhares de opções baratinhas
Use nossa busca ou navegue pelas categorias e listas especiais pra encontrar as ofertas de comida nos melhores restaurantes, promoções de bebida, pizzaria, farmácia, pet shop ou compra de mercado. Depois, é só colocar na sacola e fechar seu pedido online. Em pouco tempo, o entregador estará na sua porta com tudo o que pediu do restaurante ou supermercado.

Acompanhe seu pedido
No iFood você recebe sua entrega de comida e mercado rapidinho e ainda pode acompanhar as etapas de preparação do pedido e entrega pelo app. Aproveite para fazer suas compras de mercado, experimentar um restaurante novo ou agendar sua comida e receber em casa.

Baixe o app de delivery que traz para pertinho de você os seus pratos favoritos, ou se decidir cozinhar, você encontra todos os ingredientes de sua receita em alguns poucos toques em supermercados. Com nosso delivery, você pede pratos dos melhores restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e pet shop!

Tá esperando o que pra baixar nosso app de delivery de comida, mercado, farmácia e pet shop? Tenha os melhores supermercados e restaurantes, aquela pizzaria do bairro ou o mercado em que você sempre compra a apenas alguns cliques de distância. Aproveite para fazer seu pedido de comida e bebida e pedir sua entrega onde estiver. Tenha pizza, hambúrguer, comida vegetariana, sushi, fast food, comida italiana e muitos outros pratos do seu restaurante ou supermercado favorito na sua casa.

Veja a lista completa das cidades onde tem entrega do iFood. Peça agora seu delivery de comida e mercado online: https://www.ifood.com.br/cidades-atendidas

¿Ya eres un Cheaf Partner?

Con la nueva aplicación para establecimientos, podrás iniciar sesión con el mismo acceso con el que entras a tu administrador web y además contarás con estas nuevas herramientas:

¿Cuentas con varias sucursales? Tendrás una vista rápida y en un click de todas y cambiar entre ellas de forma fácil.
Modifica tu stock de paquetes de forma intuitiva
Visualiza tus órdenes pendientes, entregadas, canceladas, y no completadas
Filtra tus órdenes por fecha y por estatus
Solicita desde la app la edición de horarios y dirección de tu negocio

¿Aún no eres un Cheaf partner? Nos encantará ayudarte a monetizar tus excedentes mientras ayudas al planeta. Regístrate en https://cheaf.com/negocios/ para comenzar.

Mientras lees esto, toneladas de alimentos están siendo desperdiciados, ¡Únete ya al movimiento!

Más que delivery, tu forma de pedir.

Con Moka descubrís restaurantes, tiendas y mucho más cerca tuyo. Pedí fácil, elegí a tu manera y coordiná directamente con el negocio. Simple, rápida y hecha para vos.

¿Cómo funciona?

Explorá locales disponibles según tu ubicación.

Personalizá tu pedido con extras y preferencias.

Con Moka, hacés todo en un par de toques: descubrís, pedís y conversás.
Sin intermediarios, sin complicaciones.

Sushi Score: The Ultimate Sushi Counter!

Are you a sushi fanatic? Do you dominate the all-you-can-eat sushi scene? Then Sushi Score is the app you NEED! Forget mental math and embarrassing finger counting – now you can effortlessly track your sushi conquests with a simple tap!

How it works:
- Tap to tally: Just tap the adorable sushi face every time you devour a delicious roll. It's that easy sushi counting!
- High score hero: Sushi Score automatically tracks your highest sushi-eating achievement. Can you beat your personal best? 
- Bragging Rights: Share your epic sushi scores with friends and challenge them to a sushi showdown! Show them your sushi count!

Let's be honest, our happy sushi is appealing. Who wants to tap a boring button when you can tap a cute piece of sushi whilst sushi counting? We've designed Sushi Score to be incredibly user-friendly. No complicated menus or confusing features – just pure sushi-counting bliss. Track your progress and see how your sushi skills evolve over time.
Aplicación oficial de pedidos de La Redonda.

Pinta Libre es el upgrade que tus salidas necesitan.
Con nuestra suscripción PRO, disfrutás todos los días de un 2x1 mejorado: pedís dos productos y el de menor valor es gratis. ¡Eso es pintear!

¿Qué podés pintear?
- Café
- Jugo o tragos
- Cerveza
- Vino
- Comida


Así de simple:
Elegí el bar, restaurante o cafetería desde la app.
Pedí dos productos.
El de menor valor no lo pagás.
Mostrá tu pinteo y listo.

Ventajas PRO:
- Pinteos ilimitados (1 por establecimiento por día).
- Más de 150.000 suscriptores en 9 países.
- Cancelás cuando quieras.

Con un solo pinteo al mes ya recuperás el valor de la suscripción.

Disponible en:
Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, México, Panamá, Perú, República Dominicana y Uruguay.

----------------


RECOMIENDA Pinta Libre a tus amigos

Por cada amigo que se registre usando tu código personal y luego se suscribe, obtienes beneficios.
----------------


Pinta Libre Corporativo

Tenemos planes personalizados para empresas que buscan realizar regalos especiales o premiar a sus empleados.

Contáctate a:
corporate@pintalibreapp.com

¡Descarga la app, suscríbete y comienza a pintear!

** Apple’s App of the Day in 120+ Countries **  

** Used by 2M+ Chefs Worldwide **  

"Unlimited amount of inspiration" — Netflix Superstar Ana Roš


Gronda is the #1 app for professional and home chefs. Learn from the world’s best, fine dining recipes, and connect with a global community of culinary experts. Discover inspiration, sharpen your skills, and build your personal brand as a chef.

Explore an extensive library of 50,000+ recipes from top chefs, 60+ masterclasses from industry legends, and exclusive content from chefs at starred restaurants. Use cutting-edge tools like the AI Recipe Creator to craft unique dishes, and join a community of over 2M chefs.

Subscribe to PRO to access premium content and support the chefs who inspire you. Whether you're an aspiring home chef or a seasoned professional, Gronda is your gateway to the culinary world.

GRONDA FEATURES

RECIPES FROM STARRED CHEFS 
* Find 50,000+ recipes chefs actually cook in their restaurants.  
* Exclusive content from 1,500+ chefs at starred restaurants.  
* Explore fine dining recipes and discover new inspiration for your dishes.

MASTERCLASSES FROM INDUSTRY LEGENDS
* 60+ classes from world-renowned chefs, including:  
  - Ana Roš (***), Alex Atala (**), Pascal Barbot (***), and Jan Hartwig (***).  
  - Chefs featured on the 50 Best list, including the Best Restaurant of 2024.  
* Learn techniques and tips that transform your cooking.  

ALL TOPICS COVERED
* Techniques (Sous-vide, Fermentation, Gelification, Dehydrating, Emulsifying, Freezing, Spehrification, Baking, Drying, Pressure Cooking, and many more)
* Pastry  
* Plating techniques  
* Seasonal ingredient selection  
* Flavor balancing  
* Sauce creation (Hollandaise, Béchamel, emulsifications)  
* Dessert techniques (e.g., tempering chocolate, macarons)  
* Protein preparation  
* Knife skills  

COMMUNITY OF CHEFS
* Join 2M+ chefs worldwide, from home cooks to culinary professionals.  
* Connect, share, and grow together in the only platform for real chefs.  
* Follow chefs and restaurants you love.

AI RECIPE CREATOR
* Use the power of AI to craft new variations of recipes.  
* Get creative and elevate your culinary skills.

BUILD YOUR BRAND  
* Share your recipes and creations with the community.  
* Create menus and collections with your favorite recipes. 
* Gain followers to build your reputation.  

ALSO FEATURING
* Daily inspiration from hundreds of famous chef creators.  
* Content available in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese.  

Gronda is your ultimate culinary companion, no matter your skill level. By subscribing to PRO, you support the chefs who create the recipes and classes that inspire you.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Gronda offers an auto-renewing subscription to PRO, unlocking access to premium content and tools while supporting the chefs. Payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase. Manage your subscription in your Account Settings.

Every great meal starts with OpenTable. Download the app to find the perfect restaurant no matter where life takes you.  

DISCOVER SOMETHING NEW
- Choose from over 60,000+ restaurants worldwide 
- Search for happy hours, tasting menus, and other special dining experiences
- Get insights from real diners who have visited the restaurant with verified reviews
- Filter by cuisine, pricepoint, and more to fine-tune your options
- Take advantage of expert recommendations with OpenTable’s guides 

FIND A TIME THAT WORKS FOR YOU
- Search for specific dates, times, and specific locations to see what’s available when you want to go out 
- View full availability to see when you can get into your favorite spots 
- Use Notify Me to receive alerts for last-minute openings at popular restaurants

MANAGE YOUR PLANS IN ONE PLACE
- View and change reservations from the app
- Direct message with restaurants to ask questions, provide important information like dietary restrictions, and more 
- Earn bonus points for dining at specific restaurants when you create an OpenTable account
